mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ( SELECT SUM(ALL_COUNT) AS ALL_COUNT, SUM(ALL_SELL_PAY_AMT) AS ALL_SELL_PAY_AMT, SUM(FIRST_COUNT) AS FIRST_COUNT, SUM(FIRST_SELL_PAY_AMT) AS FIRST_SELL_PAY_AMT, SUM(PART_COUNT) AS PART_COUNT, SUM(PART_SELL_PAY_AMT) AS PART_SELL_PAY_AMT, SUM(REFUND_COUNT) AS REFUND_COUNT, SUM(REFUND_SELL_PAY_AMT) AS REFUND_SELL_PAY_AMT, DIM_COMPANY FROM DM_FACT_FUNNEL_STUDENT_SELL_COMPANY WHERE 1=1
GROUP BY DIM_COMPANY)S

SELECT SUM(ALL_COUNT) AS ALL_COUNT, SUM(ALL_SELL_PAY_AMT) AS ALL_SELL_PAY_AMT, SUM(FIRST_COUNT) AS FIRST_COUNT, SUM(FIRST_SELL_PAY_AMT) AS FIRST_SELL_PAY_AMT, SUM(PART_COUNT) AS PART_COUNT, SUM(PART_SELL_PAY_AMT) AS PART_SELL_PAY_AMT, SUM(REFUND_COUNT) AS REFUND_COUNT, SUM(REFUND_SELL_PAY_AMT) AS REFUND_SELL_PAY_AMT, DIM_COMPANY FROM DM_FACT_FUNNEL_STUDENT_SELL_COMPANY WHERE 1=1
GROUP BY DIM_COMPANY
